p: There are six strains of coronaviruses that are confirmed infectious to humans, which are named for their coronary appearance with positive single-stranded RNA genomes [ 15]. Similar to SARS and MERS, SARS-CoV-2 is a kind of highly pathogenic coronavirus that could cause severe respiratory illness and even death [ 16]. However, SARS-CoV-2 has higher transmissibility from human to human comparatively, which makes humans vulnerable to infection and makes it harder to get this outbreak under control [ 17â€“ 19].
